CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trLockDates__c), false, IF(TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trLockDates__c && TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trIsMilestone__c && TASKRAY__trPredecessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c > TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c, true, IF(ISPICKVAL(TASKRAY__trDependencyType__c , 'Finish-To-Start'), TASKRAY__trPredecessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c > TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trStartDate__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(TASKRAY__trDependencyType__c , 'Finish-To-Finish'), TASKRAY__trPredecessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c > TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(TASKRAY__trDependencyType__c , 'Start-To-Start'), TASKRAY__trPredecessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trStartDate__c > TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trStartDate__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(TASKRAY__trDependencyType__c , 'Start-To-Finish'), TASKRAY__trPredecessorTask__r.TASKRAY__trStartDate__c > TASKRAY__trSuccessorTask__r.TASKRAY__Deadline__c, false))))))
CustomField.label: In Schedule Conflict
